pages.text:
April 2025 County of Marin EMS N 1
COMA/ALOC
Indications
GCS <15, etiology unclear (consider AEIOU TIPS); sudden onset of weakness, paralysis,
confusion, speech disturbances, headache
• ALS RMC
• ETCO2 monitoring
Position patient with low
Fowler’s and left lateral
recumbent if vomiting
BG <60 or immeasurable BG <60 or immeasurable Narcotic Overdose
and unable to start IV
• Dextrose 10% 25GM/ • Narcan
250ml • Glucagon 1mg IM • IV/IO/IM: 0.4-4mg
• 125ml bolus IV/IO over • Repeat q2-3 min
10 min titrate to adequate
• Recheck BG and repeat respiratory status
as needed • IN: 2-4mg (split evenly
between nostrils)
• Repeat q2-3 min
titrate to adequate
respiratory status
SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS
Indication for c-spine precautions
Diabetic complications
If Stroke suspected, see Stroke/TIA Policy, N 4
